bibl.title: Hair Analysis: a Case Study of Pathological and Social Information Gained from the Greco-Roman Cemetery at Dakhleh Oasis.
Achievements and Problems of Modern Egyptology. Proceedings of the International Conference Held in Moscow on September 29 - October 2, 2009.
